item.title: Things I Learned From the GMTK Game Jam
item.description: That’s when I realized, I was trying to make an IMPRESSIVE game, rather than a FUN one (which probably says a lot about my insecurities). I am NOT known for actually finishing my projects. Contrary to popular belief, creativity is NOT a rare talent. It’s not even a minority trait. Literally everyone is able to come up with an abundance of ideas, some of which are actually quite practical and executable.
